page.description: Unzips files in a zip file. This high level function is a wrapper around the low level file.unzip() method.
page.syntax: C unzip_files(C zipfile [,C mask [,C destination_folder [,L preserve_Paths ]]])

argument.name: zipfile
argument.description: The fully qualified name of the Zip file.

argument.name: mask
argument.description: Default = "*.*". A file specification that selects files within the Zip file. The specification may used wildcards.

argument.name: destination_folder
argument.description: The target folder to receive the unzipped files.

description.p: .T. = Creates the same subfolder structure under Destination_Folder that the original files had.
.F. = Unzips all files into the Destination_Folder.

page.discussion: UNZIP_FILES() extracts files from Zipfile_Name, that match the Mask specification, to the Destination_Folder. The function is a high level wrapper around the FILE.UNZIP()method.

section.note: UNZIP_FILES does not support extracting password protected zip archives.
